about_the_game:
All softwares on the desktop fell into a sea full of sharks:

Driving a toy car in a cluttered pile of software:

Or you don't want to do anything and just want to enjoy the sunset up close:

Feature

  • Put all the apps on the desk on the bookshelf, throw them into the sea, or use them as billiards to hit!
  • Driving a toy car aimlessly in the forest!
  • Use runtime editor to align icon objects to each pixel, Or just throw them around!
  • The themes are diverse, and the icons have come to life. They are not intended to be useful, but purely fun.
  • Respond to audio! Synchronize system time! Not the feature you want? Vote for it!
  • ......

Howto

  • Use the left button to drag and move the model to any position.
  • Scroll mouse wheel to change the FOV of the camera.
  • Press and hold the right button to rotate the camera's perspective, and then press the W/S/A/D key to move the camera,
  • Right click on the model to open the corresponding menu.
  • Right click on the blank space to open the global menu, where you can enter editing mode or open settings.

Trouble Shooting [Very very important!]

  • If window not showing when you open the app, please enable vertical sync from NVIDIA Control Panel then reopen the app.
  • If the program cannot replace the desktop background properly after running, it may be intercepted by antivirus software such as 360. Solution: Add the folder where the software is located to the antivirus software's whitelist.
  • Can this software coexist with other wallpaper software？—— Of course you can! As long as the computer is in split screen mode, the target display screen for the software can be specified in the settings window.
  • Can this software coexist with desktop beautification aids ( e.g, Rainmeter)?—— Sure! Why Not!

Contact

If you have some questions or suggestions for this program, feel free to contact me via the support email, I will response ASAP, thanks!
  • EMail：beafraid2@163.com
  • QQ Group: 159714089 (You can discuss or share ideas here).

detailed_description:
Workshop

  • Each Mod's environmental settings, post effects, and item placement can be independently configured!
  • Provide easy-to-use Unity SDK, you can put any fantastic environment you like on Desktop, or write scripts to implement funny behavior!
  • It's easy to update mod, you don't even need to know about coding!
